name: Void Bubble Pop
description:
A Void Bubble Popping Simulation game where you pop as many bubbles as you can before a timer runs out. See how long you can survive.

So, as a form of explanation: My real goal here was to make a game with a fleshed out and polished presentation. Which I think I managed well enough. The menus look nice, and its VERY satisfying to click on the bubbles and watch them pop. That goal didn't really include making it a 'game' or 'playable' or 'much more than a fun experiment.'

Having said that, it is a FUN experiment. 

Currently the spawning of the bubbles is tied to your monitors FPS. Meaning there is no consistency of experience. Also there's not really a 'replay' option. Because I couldn't QUTIE figure out how to get a replay option to function while still being able to track how long you managed to survive. These are all problems for a later update, however. For now, I present it in all its janky ill-conceived glory.
